name: The Journey of Bean
description:
Help Bean journey from his home village to find out who killed his family. On the journey to the big boss, fight minion enemies and meet new friends who will journey along with you. Beat the big boss to avenge Bean's family and  win glory for Bean and his friends!

Controls: arrows or AWSD to move, space bar or mouse to shoot

Made By: Elizabeth Crittell, Amelia Kempf, Rachel Koerner, Garrett Geisler
